channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: At junction of York Way and Goods Way, 9th November
item.description:
There are 4 street lights not working and one that is flickering. One is on the west side of York Way at the corner of Goods Way; then the first 2 lights on each side of Goods Way after the junction of York Way - 3 are broken and 1 is flickering. One of my neighbours was nearly mugged at 6.30pm last Sunday at exactly that location and had to run away. The lights have been broken for at least 2 weeks. I walk there every evening after work. I will have to change my route until they are fixed. Please fix them immediately
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goods Way, King's Cross, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: No hire bikes left in pedestrian only spaces., 9th November
item.description:
Moved to end of street noting tyres are flat. Datchelor Place is not a place for parking hires bikes. It is pedestrian only. All bikes will be removed. Please be kinder to pedestrians

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mary Datchelor Close, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street cleaning, 9th November
item.description:
The street cleaning machine hasn't been into the Close for several weeks. We see it in Foxgrove Road and Foxgrove Avenue but it drives straight past our Close. We are inundated by leaves from the trees in Foxgrove Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Convent Close, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing dog bin, 9th November
item.description:
Bin outside 75 - 77 Camberwell Grove has been overflowing onto the street for over a week, with bags of dog faeces now ont he pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Camberwell Grove, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pigeon - death by catapult from the kids on the estate!, 9th November
item.description:
Looks as though the pigeon has been hit as it was found face down in the garden in a pool of blood. There are multiple young boys with catapults daily doing this - they look at the rooves of the houses and take a shot. It’s cruel and they are vile. Please can the pigeon be removed it’s been bagged and left on the drive.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 135, Lullingstone Crescent, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: CATV cover loose outside Tern Court, 9th November
item.description:
Dangerous loose manhole cover, tilts without warning when stepped on. Not sure how long it has been like this but almost fell, so concerned other people may trip or fall.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, Shortlands, London
